caption.title: Characteristics of household contacts who did and did not receive tuberculin skin testing.
caption.p: Putative causal pathways are shown by arrowed lines. Unmeasured variables are filled in white. Using the backdoor criteria, study site, household contact sex and HIV status, and index case age, sex, HIV status and microbiological TB status were identified as the minimal sufficient adjustment set of covariates for estimating the direct effect of index case HIV status on latent TB infection.
Click here for additional data file.
